thread.title: Obamas Rack Up Nearly $100m Taxpayer Subsidized Travel Bill Over 8 Years
thread.title_full: Obamas Rack Up Nearly $100m Taxpayer Subsidized Travel Bill Over 8 Years

author: K. Campbell
title: Obamas Rack Up Nearly $100m Taxpayer Subsidized Travel Bill Over 8 Years
text:
Over 60 Percent Of Democrats Don’t Want Hillary Running For President Ever Again 
Judicial Watch president Tom Fitton claimed that the “Obamas’ notorious abuse of presidential travel perks wasted military resources and stressed the Secret Service.” 
“Judicial Watch estimates that the final costs of Obama’s unnecessary vacation and political travel will well exceed $100 million,” he explained in the report. 
In fact, the costs were originally estimated to be around $85 million, but, of course, the first family had to spend Christmas in Hawaii , which increased the figure, the International Business Times reported.   
Fox Business reporter Adam Shapiro pointed out that, even though President George W. Bush and his family often traveled to their ranch in Crawford, Texas, Obama’s travel costs were neverheless higher. 
While presidents typically pay for personal trips out of their own pockets, The Washington Post reported, taxpayer dollars cover the costs of the staff and security as well as the use of Air Force One. 
The Obamas’ took a total of 29 vacations over their eight years in the White House spanning 228 days — which, as Zero Hedge noted, at an aggregate cost of $90 million, equates to roughly $400,000 per day or $3.1 million per trip. 
Furthermore, it would be bad enough if it were just vacations that taxpayers had spent this much money on, but we paid for political trips, too.
